price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ni nde ubaha amafunguro aturutse mu birere no mu isi?” Vuga uti “Ni Allah! Kandi mu by’ukuri, yaba twe cyangwa mwe (abahakanyi) hari abari mu nzira y’ukuri cyangwa mu buyobe bugaragara.”
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ مَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُۖ وَإِنَّآ أَوۡ إِيَّاكُمۡ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi quli al-lahu wa-innā aw iyyākum laʿalā hudan aw fī ḍalālin mubīnin
